SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Integrate ridership recovery, cost control, and reliability into a consensus roadmap for a metropolitan rapid transit network.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. Peak/off-peak shifts, remote work patterns, maintenance backlog. 2. Fare policies, accessibility, equity and coverage. 3. English-only output; PCG + ratings; measurable targets. 4. Dual Output + Verification Report mandatory. 5. Prioritized sequencing required.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integrate and prioritize without criticism.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: 1. Ratings at Step 2. 2. Strict XML. 3. PCG + MSV. 4. Dual Output + Verification. 5. Targets and sequencing.
